attributes.additional_details:
( 1 )Face Off Report - Big Brother Watch. (May 2019)

( 2 )B.B.C. News. "Police facial recognition system faces legal    challenge" (Gaetan Portal) 25/7/2018.

( 3 ) Liberty Human Rights. "Resist Facial Recognition" liberty client- Ed Bridges v South Wales Police ( report ) 26 April 2019.

( 4 ) A recent example of an individual who was fined had no choice in the trials at Romford station and was fined for being abusive to the police , was still forced to have his picture taken.
attributes.background: Well publicised public trails are one thing, but, "secret trails" are very disturbing and needs parliamentary debate.   that this data gathering exercise has resulted in  nearly 20% of the U.K. population being now on police records without their knowledge or consent .
